name: Hunt Together
storyline: Hunt Together is a multiplayer VR game offering two Player vs Player modes, in which you take on the role of the bold Hunter or the terrifying Ghost. Your task will be to defeat your opponent with the help of numerous skills, items and usable environmental elements. The arenas of your battles are spooky, chilling locations, such as an abandoned mine, a haunted mansion or a forgotten orphanage.
summary: Feel the thrill of a hunt in a 1v1 Duel or up to 1v3 Hide and Seek mode that will push your wits, perceptiveness, and courage to their very limits. Employ an array of items, triggers, and skills fit to your class to outsmart and defeat your foe - a terrifying Ghost or a dauntless, vigilant Hunter.
